line.text: %Blob%: Yeah, yeah, ya done real good, X-Man. All the bombs are defused. Now if it ain't too much trouble, would ya do something to fix this wall I'm tryin' to support?
line.textb: %Blob%: I kinda thought you'd cut out on me and leave me with those bombs. Thanks for defusing them. Now could ya do somethin' about this wall I'm holdin' up?
